document.full_text: the body of an anchorage teacher who went missing in japan following the earthquake and tsunami in march has been found more than three weeks later, a family spokeswoman said on wednesday.
document.title: body of american recovered weeks after japan tsunami
lines_and_colors: the body of an anchorage teacher who went missing in japan following the earthquake and tsunami in march has been found more than three weeks later, a family spokeswoman said on wednesday.
